Title: Nine
Writer: Michael Tolkin (screenplay), Anthony Minghella (screenplay), Arthur Kopit (Broadway musical "Nine"), Maury Yeston (Broadway musical "Nine"), Mario Fratti (Broadway musical "Nine" Italian original)
Actors: Daniel Day-Lewis, Sandro Dori, Nicole Kidman, Marion Cotillard
Plot: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 56 nominations.
